sentences.en: France originally refused to sign the treaty.
sentences.cn: 最初法国拒绝签署该条约。

sentences.en: It was originally planned to put up a big building here.
sentences.cn: 当初打算在这儿盖一座大楼.

sentences.en: It was originally published in the pages of a magazine.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章原先发表在一本杂志上.

sentences.en: Maupin's novels have all appeared originally as serials.
sentences.cn: 莫平的小说最初都是以连载的形式出现的。

sentences.en: Originally called Lili, she eventually shortened her name to Lee.
sentences.cn: 她原先叫Lili（莉莉），最后她把名字略作Lee（李）。

sentences.en: Originally I didn't want to go.
Originally released in 1957, the film was remade as "The Magnificent Seven".
sentences.cn: 这部电影最早在1957年上映，后被翻拍为《七侠荡寇志》。

sentences.en: Originally the intention was to intersperse the historical scenes with modern ones.
sentences.cn: 最初是想用现代景观点缀历史景观。

sentences.en: Originally the old man lived in Shandong Province.
sentences.cn: 这位老人原本住在山东.

sentences.en: Originally, we had planned a tour of Scotland but we didn’t go in the end.
sentences.cn: 起先我们计划到苏格兰旅游，但最后没有成行。

sentences.en: Shakespearean women's roles were originally written to be played by men.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚笔下的女性角色在创作之初是打算由男性来扮演的。

sentences.en: The building was originally used as a prison.
sentences.cn: 这幢建筑最初用作监狱。

sentences.en: The company originally intended to reopen the factory with non-union workers.
sentences.cn: 公司原打算雇用不属于工会的工人重新开工。

sentences.en: The family originally came from France.
sentences.cn: 这个家族最初来自法国。

sentences.en: The school was originally very small.
This ancient building still looks as it did originally.
sentences.cn: 这座古建筑还保留着当年的面貌.

sentences.en: This room was originally designed to be my study.
sentences.cn: 这间屋子原预定做我的书房.

sentences.en: We originally intended to stay for just a few days.
sentences.cn: 我们原先打算只逗留几天。

sentences.en: We started out originally as a taxi firm.
sentences.cn: 我们起初开业时是一家出租车公司.

words.tran_cn: 原始的；最初的；独创的；新颖的

trans.tran_cn: 起初，原来，独创地，独出心裁地，自来，本
trans.tran_en: in the beginning, before other things happened or before other things changed
